page.title: 09RECREATION / CHILDREN A.
page.content: Every Saturday morning I go to "The Mounts", a riding school for an hours lesson. It costs Â£3.50 per hour. There are three other girls with me. My pony is called Rocket and she is very strong. Our riding teacher is a good sport. Sometimes we go out for hacks on the common and that's great. I enjoy these lessons and I hope to have a pony of my own soon. Out of families at our small school of 57 children, 3 families have one horse, one family has two horses and James & Abigail's family own three horses. In Spring and Summer about 7 horses are left out on the common and 16 donkeys are turned loose each morning.
